Block.Name: Calibrated Magnetic Field [uT]
Block.Description: Retrieves the calibrated magnetometer data, with Hard Iron and Scale Factor correction. Sample rate for this algorithm is 100Hz.

Input.Name: reset
Input.Description: Reset signal. Rising edge trigers the algorithm reset.

Output.Name: data
Output.Description: Calibrated magnetometer data in microtesla unit.

Block.Name: [Sensor Hub]
Block.Description: Sensor Hub provides links to sensor and algorithms in order to retrieve data from them.

Property.Name: Data Rate
Property.Description: Defines the sensor's and algorithm's data rate in Hz. If accelerometer or gyroscope is selected as data rate source, the closest higher available output data rate (ODR) is selected.

InitCode.Line: Sensor_Hub_Init(%Data Rate Control%, %Data Rate%, %Accelerometer Full Scale%, %Gyroscope Full Scale%);

Block.Name: Calibrated Angular Rate [dps]
Block.Description: Retrieves the calibrated gyroscope data, with offset correction. Sample rate for this algorithm is 50Hz.

Input.Name: reset
Input.Description: Reset signal. Rising edge trigers the algorithm reset.

Output.Name: data
Output.Description: Calibrated gyroscope data in dps unit.

Property.Name: Acc Threshold
Property.Description: Accelerometer threshold to detect steady state in [g].

Property.Name: Gyro Threshold
Property.Description: Gyroscope threshold to detect steady state in [dps].

Property.Name: Fast Start
Property.Description: Set to ON for fast convergence at the initialization.

Property.Name: Max Angular Rate
Property.Description: Maximum expected angular rate offset when still in [dps].

Property.Name: Max Acceleration
Property.Description: Maximum acceleration module when still in [g].

InitCode.Line: MotionGC_Init(%Acc Threshold%, %Gyro Threshold%, %Filter Constant%, %Fast Start%, %Max Acceleration%, %Max Angular Rate%);

Block.Name: Quaternions 9X
Block.Description: Retrieves the oriantion data in the magnetic North referential. The output data is an orientation in quaternion format. The orinatation is computed usign accelerometer, gyroscope and magnetometer sensor. Sample rate for this algorithm is 100Hz.

Block.Name: Mux (Float)
Block.Description: Float multiplexer. Creates array from scalar inputs.

Block.Name: Demux (Float)
Block.Description: Float demultiplexer. Creates individual scalar outputs from input array.

Block.Name: Value
Block.Description: Displays up to eight integer values.

Input.Name: in
Input.Description: Input data to display. The input data size has to match with number of values.

Property.Name: Number of Values
Property.Description: Defines number of values to display. Value must be from 1 to 8.

Block.Name: Graph
Block.Description: Graph. Displays up to six real-time curves. The X-axis represents time, Y-axis is value.

Input.Name: in
Input.Description: Input data to plot (y-axis value). The input data size has to match with number of curves.

Property.Name: Number of Curves
Property.Description: Defines number of curves to plot. Value must be from 1 to 6.

Block.Name: Graph
Block.Description: Graph. Displays up to six real-time curves. The X-axis represents time, Y-axis is value.

Input.Name: in
Input.Description: Input data to plot (y-axis value). The input data size has to match with number of curves.

Property.Name: Number of Curves
Property.Description: Defines number of curves to plot. Value must be from 1 to 6.

Property.Name: Model Name
Property.Description: Name of model which will be used for visualization.

Block.Name: Graph
Block.Description: Graph. Displays up to six real-time curves. The X-axis represents time, Y-axis is value.

Input.Name: in
Input.Description: Input data to plot (y-axis value). The input data size has to match with number of curves.

Property.Name: Number of Curves
Property.Description: Defines number of curves to plot. Value must be from 1 to 6.

Property.Name: Model Name
Property.Description: Name of model which will be used for visualization.

Block.Name: Graph
Block.Description: Graph. Displays up to six real-time curves. The X-axis represents time, Y-axis is value.

Input.Name: in
Input.Description: Input data to plot (y-axis value). The input data size has to match with number of curves.

Property.Name: Number of Curves
Property.Description: Defines number of curves to plot. Value must be from 1 to 6.
